Headline: # 91 Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/Harrison
ShortDescription: # 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to police activity near Austin/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
# 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to police activity near Austin/Harrison.

Southbound buses will operate via Austin, Jackson, Central and Roosevelt.

Northbound buses will operate via Austin, Filmore, Mason, Roosevelt, Central and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Forest Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
